page.title: 02SCHOOLS
page.content: Primary age group: Within the area there are three separate campuses of separate Infant and Junior Schools.These are Chineham Park Infant(5-7yrs) and Chineham Park Junior(7-11yrs);Marnel Infant and Marnel Junior;South View Infant and South View Junior.Each pair of schools serves a catchment area containing roughly 550 houses. Four Lanes Primary School(5-11yrs) opened in 1982 to serve a new housing estate in the former village of Chineham. Secondary:- John Hunt of Everest School(11-16yrs) is the sole secondary school within this block.Only the children of Chineham Park and Marnel Schools go there from this area. History:-Chineham Park,Marnel and John Hunt schools built in late 1960's to serve a new GLC Development expansion.
